import { VerticalTabs, VerticalTab, VerticalTabPanel } from '@site/src/components/VerticalTabs';

# Invalid VerticalTab Structure

<VerticalTabs>

<VerticalTab>Valid Tab | Description | Badge</VerticalTab>
<!-- Missing VerticalTabPanel for first tab -->

<VerticalTabPanel>
Orphaned panel without matching tab
</VerticalTabPanel>

<VerticalTab>Second Tab | Another description | Badge</VerticalTab>
<VerticalTabPanel>
Valid content for second tab
</VerticalTabPanel>

<!-- Extra panel without matching tab -->
<VerticalTabPanel>
Extra panel content that should be ignored
</VerticalTabPanel>

</VerticalTabs>
